short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find your favorite sports team hex color codes easily!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SportsHex Chrome Extension is a powerful and user-friendly tool designed for sports enthusiasts who want to effortlessly find and utilize the hex color codes of their favorite sports teams. With the free version of SportsHex, you'll have access to hex color codes for two popular sports leagues, namely the NHL (National Hockey League) and the NBA (National Basketball Association). 

The extension provides a seamless experience by allowing users to easily discover and copy the hex color codes of their preferred sports teams. By simply selecting the desired team, users can swiftly retrieve the hex code and copy it to their clipboard, ensuring convenient and hassle-free usage.

SportsHex also offers a customizable visual experience with both dark and light modes, allowing users to personalize their browsing experience according to their preference. Whether you prefer a sleek dark interface or a vibrant light one, the extension ensures optimal readability and comfort.

For users seeking enhanced functionality and a broader range of features, SportsHex offers a pro version. Upgrading to the pro version provides access to additional benefits such as favorites sorting, allowing users to organize and prioritize their preferred sports teams. Moreover, the pro version expands the coverage to include a total of 12 leagues, with new leagues continuously being added over time. This ensures that users can access the hex color codes of an extensive array of sports teams across various leagues.

SportsHex Chrome Extension is the ultimate companion for sports enthusiasts who value both functionality and aesthetics. Whether you're a die-hard fan or a casual viewer, SportsHex simplifies the process of finding and utilizing hex color codes, enabling you to showcase your team spirit and create visually stunning designs with ease.
